short_summary: This is a procurement for the acquisition and delivery of  military fuel containers in Montreal, QC, Canada.
description: The requirement is to provide the military fuel containers to the Department of National Defence (DND) located in Montreal, QC, Canada.
full_summary:
**Title** 
=============

W3162-24F010 - Request for Proposal: Military Fuel Containers
-----------------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number** 
-------------------

WS4688565546

**Publication Date** 
-------------------

July 18, 2024

**Tender Closing Date** 
----------------------

August 12, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Background**
-------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites proposals for the procurement of military fuel containers to be delivered in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

**Request for Proposal Details**
-------------------------------

*   Procurement Category: General Service (GD)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Regions of Opportunity: None
*   Region of Delivery: Montreal, Quebec, Canada

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

*   Fuel tanks and systems (UNSPSC 25172400)
*   Storage and handling equipment and supplies (UNSPSC 48102100)
*   The fuel containers are to be delivered to the Department of National Defence, located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada

**Proposal Evaluation Criteria**
-------------------------------

The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

*   Lowest price
*   Technical acceptability
*   Commercial acceptability
*   Other considerations as specified in the proposal documents

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

The proposal documents, including the bearing point, shall be submitted electronically to [insert email address] by [insert deadline]. 

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

For inquiries or clarifications regarding this RFP, please contact:

*   Renee-Ann Therien, PSPC/SPAC
*   Email: renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**
--------------

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20366724?extsite=MjAzNjY3MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
